func:

name: set out_ts to update
func:
let queryTsFlg = false
if(msg.payload.length > 0){
  let updateObj = msg.payload[0]
  let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
  updateObj['out'] = actInfo.data.date
  updateObj['out_ts'] = new Date(actInfo.data.recv)
  msg.payload = updateObj
  queryTsFlg = true
  msg['scaleSt'] = updateObj['in_ts']
}
msg['queryTsFlg'] = queryTsFlg
return msg

name: set search cond to get type
func:
let obj = msg['actInfo']
let newPayload = []
let cnt = {}
let grp = {}
let cond = {}
let sort = {}
let sortField = {}
cnt['$sum'] = 1
grp['_id'] = '$extra.fport'
grp['count'] = cnt
cond['$group'] = grp
sortField['_id'] = 1
sort['$sort'] = sortField
newPayload.push(cond)
newPayload.push(sort)
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg

name: set final result
set token len
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let token = msg.payload
let ar = token.split(':')
if(ar.length !== 6){
    msg['check'] = 0
}else{
    msg['check'] = 1
    actInfo['grp'] = ar[0]
    actInfo['ts'] = ar[1]
    actInfo['userId'] = ar[2]
    actInfo['cpId'] = ar[3]
    actInfo['roleId'] = ar[4]
    actInfo['dataset'] = ar[5]
    msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
}
msg['dataset'] = actInfo.dataset
return msg

name: set url
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let urlTemplate = 'http://device-svc:1880/sensor/3?token={token}&fport={fport}'
let url = ''
url = urlTemplate.replace('{token}', encodeURIComponent(actInfo.token)).replace('{fport}', actInfo.fport)
msg.payload = url
msg.url = url
return msg

name: set mes-svc insert Flow
func:
let newPayload = {}
newPayload['tagId'] = msg.payload['tagId']
newPayload['macAddr'] = msg.payload.loc.macAddr
newPayload['macAddr_name'] = msg.payload.loc.name
newPayload['factory_val'] = msg.payload.loc.meta.factory.val
newPayload['factory_name'] = msg.payload.loc.meta.factory.name
newPayload['zone_val'] = msg.payload.loc.meta.zone.val
newPayload['zone_name'] = msg.payload.loc.meta.zone.name
newPayload['station_val'] = msg.payload.loc.meta.station.val
newPayload['station_name'] = msg.payload.loc.meta.station.name
newPayload['in_ts'] = msg.payload['in']
newPayload['out_ts'] = msg.payload.out == 'NA' ? null:msg.payload.out
let extra = msg.payload.extra
if(extra['NW'] !== undefined)
  newPayload['weight'] = extra['NW']
else if(extra['GW'] !== undefined)
  newPayload['weight'] = extra['GW']
else
  newPayload['weight'] = null
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg

name: set to parameter
set frameCnt
func:
let testData = msg['testData']
if(msg.payload != null){
  testData[0].frameCnt = parseInt(msg.payload)+1
}else{
  testData[0].frameCnt = 1
}
testData[0].channel = 999999999
testData[0].sf = 9
testData[0].time = new Date()
testData[0].gwip = '127.0.0.1'
testData[0].gwid = '0000000000000000'
testData[0].repeater = '00000000ffffffff'
testData[0].systype = 0
testData[0].rssi = -1
testData[0].snr = -1
testData[0].snr_max = 0
testData[0].snr_min = -2
msg.payload = testData
return msg

    actInfo['cpId'] = ar[3]

}

name: set payload to mqtt server
func:
let newPayloads = []
let newPayload = {}
let extraInfo = {}
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let tagInfo = msg['tagInfo']
let checkResult = msg.payload.responseCode == '500'? 'AA008E':'AA018E'
let receiveTime = actInfo.data.timestamp
let publishTime = Date.now()
let delayFlg = true
if(publishTime - receiveTime > 1000)
  delayFlg = false
newPayload['macAddr'] = actInfo.data.information.moduleMac
newPayload['data'] = checkResult
newPayload['id'] = 'aaa'
extraInfo['port'] = 170
extraInfo['txpara'] = '22'
newPayload['extra'] = extraInfo
newPayloads.push(newPayload)
msg.payload = newPayloads
msg['topic'] = 'GIOT-GW/DL/' + actInfo.data.extra.gwid
msg['delayFlg'] = delayFlg
return msg

name: set url
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let urlTemplate = 'http://device-svc:1880/sensor/3?token={token}&fport={fport}'
let url = ''
url = urlTemplate.replace('{token}', encodeURIComponent(actInfo.token)).replace('{fport}', actInfo.fport)
msg.payload = url
msg.url = url
return msg
